description.en-us: Action Racers was a series of larger-scale (approximately 1:43 scale) Hot Wheels cars produced from 1987 to about 1996, initially under the Hot Wheels Giants line. These were a series of Hot Wheels cars which featured clockwork motors which could be activated by pulling back and releasing, akin to many other clockwork toy cars. These were manufactured by ARCO Toys , a subsidiary of Mattel.
